cui_name: Myeloid and/or lymphoid neoplasm associated with platelet derived growth factor receptor alpha rearrangement
reasoning: PDGFRA-rearranged neoplasms include eosinophilia-associated disorders and other rare myeloid/lymphoid malignancies. Estimated incidence ~0.2 per 100k based on WHO classification data and reported case frequencies.
source: WHO Classification of Tumours of Haematopoietic and Lymphoid Tissues
